A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film certainly struck a nerve. Just look at all the 5 and 1 star reviews. Most of them just regurgitate nonsense. This is why no one takes the RT audience score seriously. It's too easy to manipulate.. When you look at other scores you see the divide is much less. It's just a very angry minority upset over a film. Which is bizarre because The Last Jedi is fun. To each their own I guess.... Although there's better ways to deal with it.
